text:
Message 77 of 4024
Ok. I’m not sure how that happened
Sent:12/27/2023 at 01:40 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 01:43 PM)
Subject:Re: Xmas Gift
Message 78 of 4024
First, this is not the kind of thing I expected a quick reply to. We are good on things like this while you are at work in my mind.
Second, to be clear, I’m not looking to blame anyone. I hope it did not come across that way. I just wanted to share because we will probably be giving
him an unbudgeted $650 unless we want him to learn a hard lesson.
Either way you might say something to him and say we will let it slide this time but it’s a costly goof. I’ll see if I can use it for something creative so it’s
not a total loss.
Sent:12/27/2023 at 01:49 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 01:52 PM)
Subject:Re: Xmas Gift
Message 79 of 4024
Ok. Let’s discuss when things don’t feel so tense. Now I feel anyway I respond is not going to be satisfactory.
Agree I am at work and will not spend energy on this currently
Sent:12/27/2023 at 01:54 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 01:57 PM)
Subject:Re: Xmas Gift
Message 80 of 4024
Totally agree.
That is why I noted it. Let’s discuss but perhaps I just put a tag in the subject line where you can see immediately like: <<nu>> for not urgent or
<<fyi>> or <<later>>
But as the subject says now- not urgent. Let’s make this work for us rather than against. We just need to share mutual expectations.
Sent:12/27/2023 at 02:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 02:04 PM)
Subject:Re: Xmas Gift <<nu>>
